Title: Byomkesh Phire Elo
Actors: Abir Chatterjee, Saswata Chatterjee, Usashi Chakraborty, Koushik Sen
Plot: The police seeks help from Byomkesh to solve the murder mystery of a wealthy old man Benimadhab and his servant Meghraj. He and Ajit find the case submerged in crooked intentions of family members.
